name: The Unknown (itch) (Invalid_Name_404)
description:
After a horrible and mysterious event happening, you must find your way out of the storage facility to meet up with your father who is waiting for you. Unravel the mysteries and find your way out before they leave you there... 

Controls:

ASWD / Arrow Keys for movement

E / Left Mouse click to Interact

Shift to Run

Left Tab/ I for inventory
